author: donaldp
msg: Added method to allow to bind a context stack to a particular thread.
Also added auxilliary method to allow retrieval of current stack without creating it if it does not exist.

author: donaldp
msg: Made closed default to true in case a poorly written subclass operates on class before calling open.

author: donaldp
msg: Massive update of all the old output targets.
This was to improve thread safety of targets. It was also to add features like allowing head and tail messages for each log session. It also significantly improves error handling.

author: donaldp
msg: Added commented out constructor to be used after Avalons release. (We can't use it now as it relies on unreleased version of logkit).

author: donaldp
msg: Removed code that issued deprecated warnings.
